attributes.additional_details: I encourage the HM UK Government to ban all firearms in the United Kingdom. Society does not need its members to be equipped with weapons of murder.   This is not a knee jerk reaction to the Incidents in US or Dunblane. I would not take any pride in saying ,”I told you so”. My horror would be a copycat of the Sandy Hook massacres.  Please take a stance and Ban the Lot and imprison those who choose ignore.
